treatment-md.title: Cyclocoelidae Stossich 1902
treatment-md.article-title: Revision of the family Cyclocoelidae Stossich, 1902 with the proposal of two new subfamilies and the description of a new species of Morishitium Witenberg, 1928 from the common snipe, Gallinago gallinago, from Texas, U. S. A.
